entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:58 a.m. ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets or freezing rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets mixed with rain beginning this evening then changing to freezing rain before morning. Ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or freezing rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches developing in the morning. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
